title: Fire
description: After being killed by demons, former angel Adam wakes up without a memory. When he is taken in by his enemies, they do everything they can to make him one of their own. But there is one thing they keep Part of Adam’s soul lives on in Claire. And it is calling for him…Join Adam’s journey through the darkness. Fire is the second book in the bestselling Wings Trilogy retold from Adam's point of view.SUGGESTED READING #1 White #2 Black #3 Gray #4 Spark #5 Fire #6 Ashes OR #1 Spark #2 Fire #3 Ashes #4 White #5 Black #6 Gray
author: Angelina J. Steffort
